text: The Miracle Maker () is a 1922 Soviet silent comedy movie directed by Aleksandr Panteleyev.Чудотворец (1922)ЧУДОТВОРЕЦ (1922) It stars Pyotr Kirillov, Yelena Tumanskaya, and Vasili Kozhura. ==Actors== * Pyotr Kirillov - Yeremei Mizgir * Yelena Tumanskaya - Dunya * Vasili Kozhura - Nicholas I * Raisa Mamontova - Alexandra Feodorovna == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1922 comedy movies
title: The Miracle Maker (1922 movie)
